ref: 3145 kiṁnara m. ʻ a centaur ʼ Mn., ˚rā -- f. ʻ a musical instrument ʼ, ˚rī -- f. ʻ a lute of Caṇḍālas ʼ lex. [kím, nára -- ]
Pa. kinnara -- m. ʻ a little bird with a head like a man's ʼ;
Pk. kiṇṇara -- m., ˚ī -- f. ʻ centaur ʼ;
S. kīniro m. ʻ a musical instrument like a fiddle ʼ;
M. kinrī f. ʻ a certain musical instrument ʼ;
Si. kin̆durā ʻ a mythical being, a centaur, merman ʼ, ˚rī f. ʻ mermaid ʼ.
